DataTransferItemKind.summary:
The read-only DataTransferItem.kind property returns a
representing the drag data item kind: some text
or some file.

remarks.para:
-Drag and drop
-Drag Operations
-Recommended Drag Types
-DataTransfer test - Paste or Drag

DataTransferItemKind.value:
A string representing the drag data item's kind. It must be one of
the following values:
